seo.title: Welcome to the official source for trains in Great Britain
seo.description: You've found the gateway to Britain's national rail network. The portal to rail travel, including train times, information, fares enquiries, promotions and tickets

image.altText: A railway viaduct with a field of yellow flowers in front, and a bright blue and white sky behind.

content.value: Find real-time departure and arrival information for any National Rail station in Great Britain.
All the top news and stories from National Rail.

items.name: Musical Routes 25 topic card
items.title: Go Behind the Tracks with Musical Routes
items.bodyText: Listen to our new audio guides, as Jo Whiley, Melanie Blatt and Yinka Bokinni explore some of the most iconic British locations that have helped to define musical culture

image.name: Musical Routes topic card 2025
image.altText: Melanie Blatt, a white woman with long brown hair, Yinka Bokinni, a Black woman with dark braided hair, and Jo Whiley, a white woman with blonde hair, wearing summery clothes and smiling as they walk along a train platform.

items.name: May Bank Holiday Travel info topic card
items.title: Check before you travel on the Late May Bank Holiday weekend
items.bodyText: From Saturday 24 to Monday 26 May, planned engineering works and upgrades are taking place. Be in the know before you go and plan your journey in advance

image.name: May Bank Holidays topic card image
image.altText: A path through Hyde Park in London, there are lots of trees with pink blossom overhanging the path and causing dappled shadows on the grass and path.

items.name: Advice for Autistic Passengers topic card
items.title: Advice for Autistic passengers
items.bodyText: You can download our new guide, An Autism Friendly Guide to Travelling by Train. It is specifically designed for Autistic people, with information about what to expect before and during your journey

image.name: Advice for Autistic Passengers topic card image
image.altText: A young white man carrying a shoulder bag and a young white woman wearing gloves and a scarf, smiling and walking at a station.

content.value: Learn more about National Rail’s goals and services.

items.name: Planned Disruption Videos topic card
items.title: Watch our planned disruption videos
items.bodyText: Sometimes planned engineering works can impact your journey, and you may need to travel by a different route or use rail replacement services. Where this happens, we provide short, accessible videos to help you plan your journey

image.name: Planned Disruption Videos topic card image
image.altText: Screenshot of a video with a white man in front of a map of a rail network, with subtitles and a white woman British Sign Language interpreter.

items.name: Theme Parks by Train topic card
items.title: 14 Thrilling Theme Parks by Train
items.bodyText: Offering everything from adrenaline-pumping roller coasters and log flumes to ferris wheels, kid-friendly rides and animal attractions, we’ve rounded up the best theme parks in England, Scotland and Wales that will have you screaming for more!

image.name: 14 Thrilling Theme Parks by Train topic card image
image.altText: Roller coasters at a theme park with passengers suspended upside down in a bright pink carriage on a loop.

items.name: Carbon Calculator topic card
items.title: Use our Carbon Calculator to check your carbon footprint
items.bodyText: Compare your carbon emissions for a National Rail train journey with car or plane travel on more than 40,000 rail journeys across Britain with the Green Travel Data Carbon Calculator

image.name: Carbon Calculator topic card image
image.altText: An infographic image that compares rail, car and air carbon commission for a journey from London Euston to Edinburgh.

items.name: Accessibility Topic Card
items.title: Accessibility
items.bodyText: We want everyone to be able to access our services – here’s what we do to support customers

image.name: Accessible Train Travel and Facilities hero image
image.altText: A woman in a wheelchair with camping equipment on the back wheels herself down a train platform with a train standing next to it.

items.name: Railcards Topic Card
items.title: Get 1/3 off with a Railcard
items.bodyText: From children to seniors, there are lots of different Railcards – see which one is right for you

image.name: Railcards homepage image card image
image.altText: 2 elderly white women with white hair are sitting next to each other at a train table, holding train tickets in their hands and laughing.

items.name: Days Out guide topic card new
items.title: Enjoy big savings with National Rail’s Days Out Guide
items.bodyText: Unlock 2FOR1, 1/3 OFF and more great offers on top attractions when you go by train

image.name: The Tower of London Inline
image.altText: The Tower of London sits on the River Thames, surrounded by green trees and sitting under a hazy blue sky.

data.name: leominster
data.summary: No trains between Hereford and Craven Arms: major disruption expected until the end of the day

logo.name: Railway 200 Logo
logo.altText: National Rail logo incorporating the Railway 200 logo in red

microcopy.ticketRestrictionsMicrocopy__introductor: Some tickets may require you to travel at specific times of the day, days of the week or on a specific route. Our Journey Planner takes ticket restrictions into account with the selection that you have made and will only have shown tickets that are valid for the selected trains.

microcopy.recentFavouritesMicrocopy__noLiveTrainsR: You don't have any searched station or journeys yet

microcopy.liveTrainsResultsMicrocopy__metaDescript: Find all your most accurate information from [[journey details]]. Including train times, platform info, possible delays, expected times of arrival, and more.
Find all your most accurate train arrival information at [[journey details]]. Including train times, platform info, possible delays, expected times of departures, and more.
